import React from 'react' const Auction = (props) => { let months = ["Janvier", "Février", "Mars", "Avril", "Mai", "Juin", "Juillet", "Aout", "Septembre", "Octobre", "Novembre", "Décembre"] let week = ["Lundi", "Mardi","Mercredi", "Jeudi", "Vendredi", "Samedi", "Dimanche"] var auction = props.auction var startDate = Date.parse(auction.startDate) console.log(startDate.toString) var endDate = Date.parse(auction.endDate) var formatedStartDate = startDate return (
{auction.title}

{week[startDate.getDay()]}

) } export default Auction
